Description: Fragmentary roundel in tapestry decorated with geometric motifs and stylised vegetal freize; made in undyed linen flying threads on a purple background; the edges have been hemmed and sewn under and can no longer be seen; the upper part of the medallion is ragged; tapestry on single threads: warp-undyed linen (S/12), weft-purple wool (S/68); flying threads: undyed linen (S)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
